alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 6:33PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 633 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Holly Ridge to near Darlove, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Washington County, including the following locations... Arcola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
